statements: SELECT * FROM VegetationMonitoring;
SELECT image_id, location, date, vegetation_cover FROM VegetationMonitoring WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT image_id, vegetation_cover, location FROM VegetationMonitoring WHERE vegetation_cover > 0.5 ORDER BY vegetation_cover DESC;
SELECT vegetation_cover, date FROM VegetationMonitoring WHERE location = ST_GeogFromText('POINT(-73.9712 40.7831)');
SELECT AVG(vegetation_cover) AS average_vegetation_cover FROM VegetationMonitoring GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM VegetationMonitoring;
SELECT image_id, location FROM VegetationMonitoring WHERE vegetation_cover > 0.5;
SELECT image_id, date FROM VegetationMonitoring WHERE location = 'Point(1 1)';
SELECT * FROM VegetationMonitoring WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY vegetation_cover DESC;
SELECT AVG(vegetation_cover) AS average_vegetation_cover, date FROM VegetationMonitoring GROUP BY date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, image_url FROM vegetation_cover;
SELECT * FROM vegetation_cover WHERE vegetation_type = 'Forest';
SELECT image_id, latitude, longitude FROM spatial_data ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT vegetation_coverage, image_url FROM vegetation_cover WHERE vegetation_type = 'Grassland' AND vegetation_coverage > 0.5;
SELECT image_date, image_url, vegetation_type FROM vegetation_cover WHERE image_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vegetation_cover WHERE image_date <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY vegetation_coverage DESC;
SELECT id, image_url, vegetation_type FROM vegetation_cover WHERE vegetation_type IN ('Trees', 'Shrubs') ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT vegetation_type, vegetation_coverage FROM vegetation_cover WHERE vegetation_coverage > 0.5 AND vegetation_type LIKE '%Grass%' ORDER BY image_date ASC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM spatial_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND longitude BETWEEN -180 AND 180 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT vegetation_type, AVG(vegetation_coverage) AS avg_coverage FROM vegetation_cover GROUP BY vegetation_type HAVING AVG(vegetation_coverage) > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_coverage DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, captured_date FROM satellite_images WHERE captured_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT image_name, captured_location FROM satellite_images ORDER BY captured_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT data_id, data_name, data_date FROM spatial_data WHERE ST_Distance(data_location, 'POINT(45.1234 34.5678)') < 10;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, captured_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY captured_date DESC;
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM spatial_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_value ASC;

SELECT satellite_images.image_name, spatial_data.data_name, vegetation_monitoring.change_type FROM satellite_images JOIN vegetation_monitoring ON satellite_images.image_id = vegetation_monitoring.image_id JOIN spatial_data ON vegetation_monitoring.data_id = spatial_data.data_id;
SELECT DISTINCT captured_location FROM satellite_images;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM satellite_images WHERE image_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM satellite_images WHERE image_name LIKE 'image%';
SELECT image_id, vegetation_coverage FROM spatial_data WHERE vegetation_coverage > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM satellite_images WHERE image_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM satellite_images JOIN image_metadata ON satellite_images.image_id = image_metadata.image_id;
SELECT image_name, spatial_coordinates FROM satellite_images JOIN spatial_data ON satellite_images.image_id = spatial_data.spatial_id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE image_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vegetation_cover LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vegetation_index, date FROM vegetation_cover ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_point, satellite_image_id FROM spatial_data WHERE satellite_image_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM change_detection WHERE satellite_image_id1 <> satellite_image_id2;
SELECT * FROM vegetation_cover WHERE vegetation_index > 0.5;
SELECT image_url FROM satellite_images WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT location_point, satellite_image_id FROM spatial_data ORDER BY satellite_image_id DESC;
SELECT change_id, date FROM change_detection WHERE date >= '2022-03-01' AND date <= '2022-04-01';
SELECT vegetation_type_name FROM vegetation_types WHERE vegetation_type_id IN (1, 3, 5);
